come and roll with the everyday thugs stayin +down foe my thang+ stayin true to the game cause thats all i know im a street nigga keep the heat nigga gettin street figures all night long i gots to go get me some money cause just like that nigga gots to have it it be greens or spinach or cabbage whatever you call it can do your math and work this magic get on the grind in position to be the boss niggas can floss and talk but i know they soft but a nigga like me stay raw on the d.l. cause what we sell aint none of nobodys business never was and nigga never will be thinkin im broke but im out here filthy feelin me yall niggas be killin me brag about the money that you claim you makin fuck around catch your dumbass sleepin then that money be up for the takin yeah i bring home the bacon and nigga thats all ima let you know you already know when i stole the show little man with the big dough run these hoes
